edu.rit.m2mi.life3
Interface LifeController

All Known Implementing Classes:
LifeControllerImpl
public interface LifeController

Interface LifeController specifies the interface for an object that controls the computation in the Game of Life (version 3).

During each round, when a cell has finished calculating its next state, the cell calls ready() on the controller. When a cell UI button has finished updating the display, it also calls ready() on the controller. When all cells and buttons have reported they're ready, the controller decides whether to start the next round, and if so calls next() on all the cells.

M2MI Library Version 02-Jul-2002

Method Summary
 void ready()
          Report that a cell or UI button is ready to go on to the next round.
 

Method Detail

ready

Report that a cell or UI button is ready to go on to the next round.
